column4: Hello everyone. I'm a completely new Ubuntu user switching from XP. I'm reading the documentation right now but I'm sure I'll have questions later. ;)
I was told that in Ubuntu you shouldn't be logged in as root to install packages and should instead use sudo. Is it BAD to be in root?
It never prompted me to select a root password though is it the same as my user pass?
i normally use root if have to execute more then 1 command
